mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Crew ( crew_name, crew_goal, crew_title, crew_location, crew_sport, crew_gender, crew_frequency, crew_age, crew_state, member_id ) VALUES ( #{crew_name}, #{crew_goal}, #{crew_title}, #{crew_location}, #{crew_sport}, #{crew_gender}, #{crew_frequency}, #{crew_age}, #{crew_state}, #{member_id} );
INSERT INTO CrewMember (crew_id, member_id, crew_member_state) VALUES (#{crew_id}, #{member_id}, #{crew_member_state});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CrewMember cm JOIN Crew c ON cm.crew_id = c.crew_id WHERE cm.member_id = #{member_id} AND cm.crew_member_state = 1;
mapper.update: UPDATE Crew SET crew_name = #{crew_name}, crew_goal = #{crew_goal}, crew_title = #{crew_title}, crew_location = #{crew_location}, crew_sport = #{crew_sport}, crew_gender = #{crew_gender}, crew_frequency = #{crew_frequency}, crew_age = #{crew_age}, crew_state = #{crew_state} WHERE crew_id = #{crew_id};
mapper.select: SELECT cm.*, up.profile_region, up.profile_age, m.nickname, cb.badge_level, m.email, m.phone FROM CrewMember cm LEFT JOIN UserProfile up ON cm.member_id = up.member_id LEFT JOIN Member m ON cm.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN CrewBadge cb ON cm.member_id = cb.member_id WHERE cm.crew_id = #{crew_id} ORDER BY cm.crew_id, cm.member_id, cm.battle_wins;
mapper.delete: delete from CrewMember WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND crew_id = #{crew_id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CrewPost( crew_post_title, crew_post_content, crew_post_img, crew_post_state, crew_id, member_id ) VALUES ( #{crew_post_title}, #{crew_post_content}, #{crew_post_img}, #{crew_post_state}, #{crew_id}, #{member_id} );
mapper.select: SELECT cp.*, m.nickname FROM CrewPost cp LEFT JOIN Member m ON cp.member_id = m.member_id WHERE cp.crew_id = #{crew_id} AND cp.crew_post_id = #{crew_post_id};
mapper.update: UPDATE CrewPost SET crew_post_title = #{crew_post_title}, crew_post_content = #{crew_post_content}, crew_post_img = #{crew_post_img}, crew_post_like = #{crew_post_like}, crew_post_state = #{crew_post_state} WHERE crew_id = #{crew_id} AND member_id = #{member_id} AND crew_post_id = #{crew_post_id};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CrewPost WHERE crew_id = #{crew_id} AND member_id = #{member_id} AND crew_post_id = #{crew_post_id};
DELETE FROM CrewPostLike WHERE crew_post_id = #{crew_post_id} AND member_id = #{member_id};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CrewPost WHERE crew_post_state = 2 ORDER BY crew_post_like DESC;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CrewComments WHERE crew_post_id = #{crew_post_id} AND member_id = #{member_id} AND crew_comments_id = #{crew_comments_id};
